# Functional Patterns in R

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains a set of functional patterns in R. The emphasis is on
functional programming so we focus on closures and generics rather than classes
and inheritance.
